entry.title: Isaias weakens to a tropical storm as it nears Florida

media:group.media:title: Isaias weakens to a tropical storm as it nears Florida
media:group.media:description: Isaias weakened to a tropical storm as the system headed closer to Florida, with the National Hurricane Center forecasting the storm to regain hurricane strength later in the evening. CNN Meteorologist Chad Myers has the latest. #CNN #News

entry.title: Finance columnist explains the tug-of-war between landlords and tenants during Covid-19

media:group.media:title: Finance columnist explains the tug-of-war between landlords and tenants during Covid-19
media:group.media:description: The federal enhanced unemployment benefit that out-of-work Americans have relied on amid the coronavirus pandemic has now officially expired. Many families are turning to food banks, and finance columnist Michelle Singletary says some wonâ€™t be able to pay bills. #CNN #News

entry.title: Ex-defense official on new details of UFO encounters soon to public

media:group.media:title: Ex-defense official on new details of UFO encounters soon to public
media:group.media:description: Following the news that the Pentagon has a task force looking into UFOs, CNN's Michael Smerconish speaks to a former Defense for Intelligence official under the Clinton and Bush administrations about the phenomenons.

entry.title: Polls show Biden leading, but these swing voters favor Trump

media:group.media:title: Polls show Biden leading, but these swing voters favor Trump
media:group.media:description: Polls show a widening lead for former Vice President Joe Biden, even in traditional swing states; but in focus groups among actual swing voters, it seems President Donald Trump still holds sway.

entry.title: Report: Kushner's Covid-19 testing plan 'went poof into thin air'

media:group.media:title: Report: Kushner's Covid-19 testing plan 'went poof into thin air'
media:group.media:description:
According to a Vanity Fair report, White House senior adviser, Jared Kushner, was working on a secret national testing plan in the spring to help bring the spread of Covid-19 under control.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Jake Tapper: How on Earth can Congress adjourn for the weekend?

media:group.media:title: Jake Tapper: How on Earth can Congress adjourn for the weekend?
media:group.media:description:
The House and Senate have adjourned for the weekend without coming to an agreement on a new economic stimulus package despite the looming deadline for unemployment benefits that many have relied on during the coronavirus pandemic. CNN's Manu Raju discusses with Jake Tapper.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Study examines virus transmission after summer camp outbreak

media:group.media:title: Study examines virus transmission after summer camp outbreak
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Natasha Chen examines a study that looks at how coronavirus spread at a Georgia overnight summer camp in June.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Pelosi to Brianna Keilar: That's not an appropriate question to ask

media:group.media:title: Pelosi to Brianna Keilar: That's not an appropriate question to ask
media:group.media:description:
During an interview with CNN, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi says Brianna Keilar's question on trusting US Chief of Staff Mark Meadows as a negotiator is "inappropriate".
#CNN #News

entry.title: Man who lost his mother to coronavirus makes emotional plea to the nation

media:group.media:title: Man who lost his mother to coronavirus makes emotional plea to the nation
media:group.media:description: Aaron Burch lost his mother at the age of 61. She was taken from him by coronavirus. He tells his story and pleads with everyone to wear a mask. #CNN #News

entry.title: See Dr. Anthony Fauci's heated exchange with Jim Jordan over protests during coronavirus

media:group.media:title: See Dr. Anthony Fauci's heated exchange with Jim Jordan over protests during coronavirus
media:group.media:description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, and other health experts, testify before the House Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Crisis. An exchange between Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) and Dr. Fauci got heated on the subject of protesting during the coronavirus pandemic. #CNN #News

entry.title: Hall of Fame broadcaster Bob Costas weighs in on professional and collegiate sports during pandemic

media:group.media:title: Hall of Fame broadcaster Bob Costas weighs in on professional and collegiate sports during pandemic
media:group.media:description:
Legendary broadcaster Bob Costas talks to CNN's Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta about professional sports and college athletics trying to hold seasons during the coronavirus pandemic.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Group prepares for chance Trump refuses to concede election

media:group.media:title: Group prepares for chance Trump refuses to concede election
media:group.media:description: CNN's Erin Burnett talks with Col. Lawrence Wilkerson (Ret.), who is part of a bipartisan group that has been meeting to game out scenarios if President Trump loses the election in November and refuses to concede. Trump has suggested delaying the November election because the pandemic complicates the voting process. #CNN #News

entry.title: Dr. Fauci gives his thoughts on another potential lockdown

media:group.media:title: Dr. Fauci gives his thoughts on another potential lockdown
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Anthony Fauci gives his take on if there is a need to lock down the US again to help fight the spread of Covid-19.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Cuomo pushes back as Trump confidant praises pandemic response

media:group.media:title: Cuomo pushes back as Trump confidant praises pandemic response
media:group.media:description: CNN's Chris Cuomo debates Newsmax CEO and Trump confidant Chris Ruddy over the President's handling of the Covid-19 pandemic. #CNN #News

entry.title: Tyler Perry talks to Anderson Cooper about race in America

media:group.media:title: Tyler Perry talks to Anderson Cooper about race in America
media:group.media:description: CNN's Anderson Cooper talks to filmmaker Tyler Perry about the state of race in America. #CNN #News
